articles.title: Western officials in protest over Israel Gaza policy - BBC.com
articles.description: More than 800 officials in the US and Europe have penned a letter calling for more pressure on Israel.
articles.content:
By Tom BatemanBBC State Department correspondent

articles.title: Italian mafia boss who escaped maximum security prison using bed sheets last year is captured on French island - CBS News
articles.description: Marco Raduano, one of Europe's most wanted criminals, was detained in Corsica, while his "right-hand man" was captured in Spain, authorities said.
articles.content:
A boss from one of most Italy's most violent mafias who escaped from a maximum security prison last year by using bed sheets has been captured in France, authorities in both countries said Friday.
